#################################################

Release Name:
Westward.II.Heroes.of.the.Frontier.(Sandlot.Games)-WWW

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Westward II - Heroes of the Frontier
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium 3 - 750MHz or better
RAM: 256MB
Video Card RAM: 32MB, 3D hardware acceleration required
DirectX Version: 9.0c or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Westward II - Heroes of the Frontier_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

When the town of Hope River is destroyed, three adventurous pioneers must gather resources, build thriving new settlements, and work to bring the elusive Copperhead Gang to justice. Overcome natural disasters and plot a course through new terrain as you guide your settlers to safety and success in Westward 2. Customize your towns with over 20 unique buildings and more than 30 luxury items, and stake your claim in this all-new frontier adventure! Play Westward 2 today!
